channel.title: Mysql server?
channel.description:
Hey everyone
I was looking around these forums when i came across some weird idea of a mysql server :confused: .. i have no idea what mysql is so.. can you tell me:
1. what mysql is 2. how do i get (and install) it 3. any links or other helpfull stuff
Thanks for your help :cool:

item.title: Mysql server?
item.dc:creator: @Alpha_X Alpha X
item.description:
@Alpha_X wrote:

Hello AfterLife,

MySQL is a database structued language. You can download a server and run it on your computer. It is the best way of running your server.

Since:

  • No nulls
  • Faster loading
  • Less lagg
  • Cleaner
  • WebCommunication

You can learn by reading:

http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/language-structure.html
http://dev.mysql.com/doc/
http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/connector-j.html

And the documentation of Java.

and java.sun.com

What you will need:

Connector: http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/j/5.0.html

Query Browser and misc tools: http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/gui-tools/5.0.html

Server: http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/5.0.html

Read full topic
